subject: UCHE WILLIAM ESQ
body:
UCHE WILLIAM ESQ
                                      ATTORNEYS AT LAW & SOLICITORS
                                      ADDRESS NO: 24 BROAD STREET
                                      LAGOS,NIGERIA
Good Day,
I am Attorney Uche William
I have an urgent and very profitable business proposition for you that
should be handled with extreme confidentiality.
A deceased Client of mine ( names withheld) citizen of your Country
whom hereinafter shall be referred to as my client, made a numbered
time Fixed Deposit for twelve calendar months valued at US$25,
500,000.00 (Twenty Five Million, Five Hundred thousand United States
Dollars) Only in a bank here.
My client was a Consultant, and contractor with the Nigerian National
Petroleum Corporation , (NNPC).
Upon maturity the bank has sent a routine notification in accordance
with the Company policy to his forwarding address but got no reply.
After a month they sent a reminder and finally it was discovered from
his contract employers Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation, (NNPC)
that My Client, his wife and two children died in a plane crash.On
further investigation, I found out that he died without making a Will
and all attempts to trace his next of Kin were fruitless. I therefore
made further investigations and discovered that my client did not
declare any next of Kin or relations in the Deposit paperwork with the
bank.However   no one will  come forward to claim it according to The
Government Law as provided in section 129 sub 63(N), Banking Edit of
1961 at the expiration of 10 years the money will revert to the
ownership of the Government, if nobody applies to claim the fund. Most
times shared by the senior management of the bank which is a well know
practice,you can go and verify.
My proposition to you is to seek your consent to present you as the
Next of Kin and beneficiary of my deceased client so that the proceeds
of this account valued at US$25.5million can be paid to you, so we can
share the amount on a mutually agreed percentage of 70% for me 25% for
you and 5% for any charity organization in your Country. All legal
documents to back up your claim as the deceased Next of Kin will be
provided by me. Your urgent response will be highly appreciated to
avoid making further contacts.
For further details call me on my private number +234 9056839447
Kind Regards
Attorney
Sir,Uche William Esq
ATTORNEYS AT LAW & SOLICITORS

subject: Re: UCHE WILLIAM ESQ
body:
Dear Attorney Uche William,

Thank you for your email. I am intrigued by the business proposal you have presented, however, I would need more information before proceeding. 

Could you please provide more details about your deceased client and the nature of his work? Also, could you clarify the legal implications of presenting myself as the next of kin?

I look forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: READ AND RESPOND ACCORDINGLY
body:
Dear Mr.Roberts

Thank you for the response to my proposal for this fund release and transfer.

I will give you details about this whole issue,but could you please tell me why this delay in responding because i sent this proposal to you long time . 

Again,may i know in which country you are right now.

Yours sincerely Uche William
